item.title: Introducing: Anything Better? Podcast with Bill Burr & Paul Virzi
item.itunes:title: Introducing: Anything Better? Podcast with Bill Burr & Paul Virzi
item.description:
Is there anything better? Listen in as Bill and Paul talk about things like punching plates of marinara sauce, investing in family life, sports, and poking holes in our political circus tent. Sit back and enjoy being a part of the inner circle with a cigar, cynical wisecracks, and some relatable anecdotes.

Subscribe! https://bit.ly/AnythingBetterPodcast
